page.title: 13INDUSTRY-MAYERNS.ROSE GREEN
page.content: They occupy the building at the corner of Sefter road which was until 1952 the Primary School for the area and had been since 1825. Mayerns moved into the building in 1970.The firm started by Mr and Mrs Rickwood senior also have a showroom in The Queensway,Bognor.Curtains,pelmets and drapes are made here. Mayerns also supply the material or will make up customers own material.Curtain tracks of all types are supplied and fitted.Venetian, roller and vertical blinds are made.The work force is six people using ten machines and the material used comes from factories in Nottingham and London.Mayerns supply Hospitals ,schools ,restaurants,Army and Navy establishments and private customers,in an area covered by Hampshire,Sussex and Isle of Wight.
